translated: Sambhūta🔽When one crosses over at the wrong time,
and is slow to cross when it’s the right time,
like the moon in the dark fortnight.

original: mittehi ca virujjhati.🔽Yo dandhakāle dandheti,🔽taraṇīye ca tāraye;
analyzed: mittehi ca virujjhati  yaḥ dandha kāle dandha iti  taraṇīye ca tāraye
translated: and is estranged from his friends.🔽When one crosses over at the right time,
and is slow to cross when it’s the wrong time,🔽because of proper planning,
like the moon in the bright fortnight.
and is not estranged from his friends.”
